language.entry: A skilled combatant, Blazing Lord can debilitate the adversaries and set up the field of battle to give her and her allies' and advantage. Then, when the foes are weakened and frail, she can unleash the beast within and quickly wipe down the remaining enemies, Blazing Lord fights through her own so called "Wondrous Tactics"

Wearing no more than a warrior's outfit passed down by her family, Blazing Lord relies on her dexterity and magic to avoid injury. Sharp blades of her naginata and the cursed sword she wields passed down as regalias leave little to complain in the terms of combat efficiency due to their mythical status.

Having trained as a shrine priestess, Blazing Lord can pray for and bestow blessings upon her party. Years of travelling in solitude and countless battles also taught her the importance of preparation before moving onwards, she uses her generosity to help her teammates move foward.

Despite the strange, menacing aura surrounding her, the new traveling visitor explains she means no harm and swears her loyalty to you, her only wish is the conquest of these cursed lands. While her words seem sincere, you can clearly sense she's hiding something - she seems to be the type to cause havoc.
Guaranteed Crit if target's HP below 15%%
Guaranteed Crit if target's HP below 17%%
Guaranteed Crit if target's HP below 20%%
Guaranteed Crit if target's HP below 22%%
Guaranteed Crit if target's HP below 25%%
On Kill: {colour_start|buff}Buff Self:{colour_end} +10%% DMG if in mode Beast
On Attack Hit: {colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} and {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end} target {colour_start|skill_unselectable} (120%% base){colour_end}
Cut Down and Decimate: -40%% {colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} and {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end} chance
Artificial Regalia of the Cursed Emperor
How come the future chases after me?
{colour_start|ushiro}You shall take me, but i'll chase you in hell!{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}An endless blazing inferno awaits us beyond!{colour_end}
Feel the wrath of my Inferno!
You shall receive my ultimate generosity, death.
The curse laid upon the emperor..this, is what i must use.
{colour_start|ushiro}Break the curse, slay the opression!{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}Heh, is it my time now?{colour_end}
{colour_start|ushiro}Mighty beast! Aid me and slay our adversaries!{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}So I shall{colour_end}
{colour_start|ushiro}Oh ancient spirit, bring them death they wish for{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}Gladly{colour_end}
{colour_start|ushiro}To resort to this.. Cursed Blade!{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}GWOAAAHH! Blood!{colour_end}
{colour_start|ushiro}What a pain..{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}I shall feed upon your souls.{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}There is no place for weaklings among the strongest!{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}You can run now, if you value your life{colour_end}
I would prefer if you forgot about this.
Impressive? I don't recall being proud of this.
To have such burden, is to be the emperor..?
I need to restrain myself more next time.
{colour_start|fox_god}But there's still so much to kill!{colour_end} {colour_start|ushiro}Calm down, for now.{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}Fools are no match for beings such as I.{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}Hmph. I shall waste no more time on you.{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}I bid you farewell, heroes. Do not dissapoint me.{colour_end}
Fret not. We've been through worse.
Will you be a coward, a corpse, or a victor? I'll watch upon thee.
Return to your senses, your job isn't done yet.
This is an edible from my land, you roll it like this..
Here, take this. It should fill your stomach for a while.
This is what we eat where I come from. Hope it suits your taste.
To avoid failures, is to find my inner equilibrium.
To understand the world, is to find your inner peace.
We shall work together in seek of great glory in this conquest!
Preserverance, strength and courage! Have those, and no foe will be more than a pest.
Worry not, everyone! With our skill and wits combined, this dungeon is already conquered.
My god smiles upon me, and it shall upon thee aswell now.
Worry not. Someone above is watching over us.
The emperor's blessings will help on your path.
To be victorious you need endurance and roaring strength!
A world of victory, that's what you shall aim towards.
Without hardships, there is no victory.
From my land, a soothing blessing, to enjoy these brief moments.
You heard of sake before, my friend?
Let's forget all these horrors and relax a bit, shall we?
Even if i die, I'll return! And then, you all shall burn!
{colour_start|ushiro}To accept my defeat is to.. find peace..{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}Thine will shall be passed on...{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}That's it? the curse shall never end..{colour_end}
Even if i die, i'll return! And then, you all shall burn!
{colour_start|ushiro}To accept my defeat is to.. find peace..colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}Thine will shall be passed on..{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}That's it? the curse shall never end..{colour_end}
To become the strongest, is to break the balance!
What a pain, this truly is pain..yet, it's not stopping me!
Hahaha, it's time to force a path open myself!
Retreat brings failure, the way to victory is to push foward!
There's no glory in retreat, no salvation for deserters!
{colour_start|fox_god}Why the hurry? There's still some pests left to dispose of{colour_end}
A scratch shall not stop me!
Huh, it appears you CAN do something after all!
Was that luck or perhaps you aren't blind?
{colour_start|fox_god}Is this what it takes now to call oneself a hero?{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}I will not waste my time on that.{colour_end}
It appears you have tripped, little hero.
What are you doing! The enemy is over there!
{colour_start|fox_god}Strike your enemies, nitwit, not the air around them!{colour_end}
Stop being a easy target, fool!
Only a idiot allows themself to be hit like that.
{colour_start|fox_god}Are you sure those people are on your side, girl?{colour_end}
Stop moving you are breaking my wondrous tactics!
If i accept such in a time like this it will bring shame upon I!
{colour_start|fox_god}The only remedy she needs is the blood of the fallen enemies, youngling{colour_end}
Outta of my way, I can't wreck the enemy if i'm not in the front!
{colour_start|fox_god}Bring me closer to the battlefield, this instant!{colour_end}
And who gave you permission to touch that?
{colour_start|fox_god}How could you defile that with your dirty, peasant hands...{colour_end}
I don't need such! my strength will be enough!
{colour_start|fox_god}Do not bother. Your tricks are nothing but a faux pas.{colour_end}
Silence, i desire no such thing.
Leave me be, i shall have no disturbance.
To find victory, is to find balance.
Heh, will you accept your defeat now?
This threat shall cease to exist under the emperor's might!
Sake and food to those who thrive and survive!
The emperor's wondrous tactics are unrivaled!
I didn't give you permission to die, fool!
As if i would let myself die!
Bring it on, i can still go!
Such things are no big deal to I!
This place may be otherwordly to me, alas, it stands beneath my feet.
My my, how long this goes?
I would appreciate some sake right now...
I shall note this in my scrolls..
Back then, long halls used to make me feel safe..
My presence must be taking the fiends away!
I'm opening a path ahead to victory!
Countless battles i've been to, this can't stop me!

Even if i die, I'll return! And then, you all shall burn!
{colour_start|ushiro}To accept my defeat is to.. find peace..{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}Thine will shall be passed on...{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}That's it? the curse shall never end..{colour_end}
Even if i die, i'll return! And then, you all shall burn!
{colour_start|ushiro}To accept my defeat is to.. find peace..colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}Thine will shall be passed on..{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}That's it? the curse shall never end..{colour_end}
To become the strongest, is to break the balance!
What a pain, this truly is pain..yet, it's not stopping me!
Hahaha, it's time to force a path open myself!
Retreat brings failure, the way to victory is to push foward!
There's no glory in retreat, no salvation for deserters!
{colour_start|fox_god}Why the hurry? There's still some pests left to dispose of{colour_end}
A scratch shall not stop me!
Huh, it appears you CAN do something after all!
Was that luck or perhaps you aren't blind?
{colour_start|fox_god}Is this what it takes now to call oneself a hero?{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}I will not waste my time on that.{colour_end}
It appears you have tripped, little hero.
What are you doing! The enemy is over there!
{colour_start|fox_god}Strike your enemies, nitwit, not the air around them!{colour_end}
Stop being a easy target, fool!
Only a idiot allows themself to be hit like that.
{colour_start|fox_god}Are you sure those people are on your side, girl?{colour_end}
Stop moving you are breaking my wondrous tactics!
If i accept such in a time like this it will bring shame upon I!
{colour_start|fox_god}The only remedy she needs is the blood of the fallen enemies, youngling{colour_end}
Outta of my way, I can't wreck the enemy if i'm not in the front!
{colour_start|fox_god}Bring me closer to the battlefield, this instant!{colour_end}
And who gave you permission to touch that?
{colour_start|fox_god}How could you defile that with your dirty, peasant hands...{colour_end}
I don't need such! my strength will be enough!
{colour_start|fox_god}Do not bother. Your tricks are nothing but a faux pas.{colour_end}
Silence, i desire no such thing.
Leave me be, i shall have no disturbance.
To find victory, is to find balance.
Heh, will you accept your defeat now?
This threat shall cease to exist under the emperor's might!
Sake and food to those who thrive and survive!
The emperor's wondrous tactics are unrivaled!
I didn't give you permission to die, fool!
As if i would let myself die!
Bring it on, i can still go!
Such things are no big deal to I!
This place may be otherwordly to me, alas, it stands beneath my feet.
My my, how long this goes?
I would appreciate some sake right now...
I shall note this in my scrolls..
Back then, long halls used to make me feel safe..
My presence must be taking the fiends away!
I'm opening a path ahead to victory!
Countless battles i've been to, this can't stop me!

A skilled combatant, Blazing Lord can debilitate the adversaries and set up the field of battle to give her and her allies' and advantage. Then, when the foes are weakened and frail, she can unleash the beast within and quickly wipe down the remaining enemies, Blazing Lord fights through her own so called "Wondrous Tactics"

Wearing no more than a warrior's outfit passed down by her family, Blazing Lord relies on her dexterity and magic to avoid injury. Sharp blades of her naginata and the cursed sword she wields passed down as regalias leave little to complain in the terms of combat efficiency due to their mythical status.

Having trained as a shrine priestess, Blazing Lord can pray for and bestow blessings upon her party. Years of travelling in solitude and countless battles also taught her the importance of preparation before moving onwards, she uses her generosity to help her teammates move foward.

Despite the strange, menacing aura surrounding her, the new traveling visitor explains she means no harm and swears her loyalty to you, her only wish is the conquest of these cursed lands. While her words seem sincere, you can clearly sense she's hiding something - she seems to be the type to cause havoc.
Guaranteed Crit if target's HP below 15%%
Guaranteed Crit if target's HP below 17%%
Guaranteed Crit if target's HP below 20%%
Guaranteed Crit if target's HP below 22%%
Guaranteed Crit if target's HP below 25%%
On Kill: {colour_start|buff}Buff Self:{colour_end} +10%% DMG if in mode Beast
On Attack Hit: {colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} and {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end} target {colour_start|skill_unselectable} (120%% base){colour_end}
Cut Down and Decimate: -40%% {colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} and {colour_start|blight}Blight{colour_end} chance

How come the future chases after me?
{colour_start|ushiro}You shall take me, but i'll chase you in hell!{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}An endless blazing inferno awaits us beyond!{colour_end}
Feel the wrath of my Inferno!
You shall receive my ultimate generosity, death.
The curse laid upon the emperor..this, is what i must use.

{colour_start|fox_god}You can run now, if you value your life{colour_end}
I would prefer if you forgot about this.
Impressive? I don't recall being proud of this.
To have such burden, is to be the emperor..?
I need to restrain myself more next time.

Artificial Regalia of the Cursed Emperor
How come the future chases after me?
{colour_start|ushiro}You shall take me, but i'll chase you in hell!{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}An endless blazing inferno awaits us beyond!{colour_end}
Feel the wrath of my Inferno!
You shall receive my ultimate generosity, death.
The curse laid upon the emperor..this, is what i must use.
{colour_start|ushiro}Break the curse, slay the opression!{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}Heh, is it my time now?{colour_end}
{colour_start|ushiro}Mighty beast! Aid me and slay our adversaries!{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}So I shall{colour_end}
{colour_start|ushiro}Oh ancient spirit, bring them death they wish for{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}Gladly{colour_end}
{colour_start|ushiro}To resort to this.. Cursed Blade!{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}GWOAAAHH! Blood!{colour_end}
{colour_start|ushiro}What a pain..{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}I shall feed upon your souls.{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}There is no place for weaklings among the strongest!{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}You can run now, if you value your life{colour_end}
I would prefer if you forgot about this.
Impressive? I don't recall being proud of this.
To have such burden, is to be the emperor..?
I need to restrain myself more next time.
{colour_start|fox_god}But there's still so much to kill!{colour_end} {colour_start|ushiro}Calm down, for now.{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}Fools are no match for beings such as I.{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}Hmph. I shall waste no more time on you.{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}I bid you farewell, heroes. Do not dissapoint me.{colour_end}
Fret not. We've been through worse.
Will you be a coward, a corpse, or a victor? I'll watch upon thee.
Return to your senses, your job isn't done yet.
This is an edible from my land, you roll it like this..
Here, take this. It should fill your stomach for a while.
This is what we eat where I come from. Hope it suits your taste.
To avoid failures, is to find my inner equilibrium.
To understand the world, is to find your inner peace.
We shall work together in seek of great glory in this conquest!
Preserverance, strength and courage! Have those, and no foe will be more than a pest.
Worry not, everyone! With our skill and wits combined, this dungeon is already conquered.
My god smiles upon me, and it shall upon thee aswell now.
Worry not. Someone above is watching over us.
The emperor's blessings will help on your path.
To be victorious you need endurance and roaring strength!
A world of victory, that's what you shall aim towards.
Without hardships, there is no victory.
From my land, a soothing blessing, to enjoy these brief moments.
You heard of sake before, my friend?
Let's forget all these horrors and relax a bit, shall we?
Even if i die, I'll return! And then, you all shall burn!
{colour_start|ushiro}To accept my defeat is to.. find peace..{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}Thine will shall be passed on...{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}That's it? the curse shall never end..{colour_end}
Even if i die, i'll return! And then, you all shall burn!
{colour_start|ushiro}To accept my defeat is to.. find peace..colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}Thine will shall be passed on..{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}That's it? the curse shall never end..{colour_end}
To become the strongest, is to break the balance!
What a pain, this truly is pain..yet, it's not stopping me!
Hahaha, it's time to force a path open myself!
Retreat brings failure, the way to victory is to push foward!
There's no glory in retreat, no salvation for deserters!
{colour_start|fox_god}Why the hurry? There's still some pests left to dispose of{colour_end}
A scratch shall not stop me!
Huh, it appears you CAN do something after all!
Was that luck or perhaps you aren't blind?
{colour_start|fox_god}Is this what it takes now to call oneself a hero?{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}I will not waste my time on that.{colour_end}
It appears you have tripped, little hero.
What are you doing! The enemy is over there!
{colour_start|fox_god}Strike your enemies, nitwit, not the air around them!{colour_end}
Stop being a easy target, fool!
Only a idiot allows themself to be hit like that.
{colour_start|fox_god}Are you sure those people are on your side, girl?{colour_end}
Stop moving you are breaking my wondrous tactics!
If i accept such in a time like this it will bring shame upon I!
{colour_start|fox_god}The only remedy she needs is the blood of the fallen enemies, youngling{colour_end}
Outta of my way, I can't wreck the enemy if i'm not in the front!
{colour_start|fox_god}Bring me closer to the battlefield, this instant!{colour_end}
And who gave you permission to touch that?
{colour_start|fox_god}How could you defile that with your dirty, peasant hands...{colour_end}
I don't need such! my strength will be enough!
{colour_start|fox_god}Do not bother. Your tricks are nothing but a faux pas.{colour_end}
Silence, i desire no such thing.
Leave me be, i shall have no disturbance.
To find victory, is to find balance.
Heh, will you accept your defeat now?
This threat shall cease to exist under the emperor's might!
Sake and food to those who thrive and survive!
The emperor's wondrous tactics are unrivaled!
I didn't give you permission to die, fool!
As if i would let myself die!
Bring it on, i can still go!
Such things are no big deal to I!
This place may be otherwordly to me, alas, it stands beneath my feet.
My my, how long this goes?
I would appreciate some sake right now...
I shall note this in my scrolls..
Back then, long halls used to make me feel safe..
My presence must be taking the fiends away!
I'm opening a path ahead to victory!
Countless battles i've been to, this can't stop me!

A skilled combatant, Blazing Lord can debilitate the adversaries and set up the field of battle to give her and her allies' and advantage. Then, when the foes are weakened and frail, she can unleash the beast within and quickly wipe down the remaining enemies, Blazing Lord fights through her own so called "Wondrous Tactics"

Wearing no more than a warrior's outfit passed down by her family, Blazing Lord relies on her dexterity and magic to avoid injury. Sharp blades of her naginata and the cursed sword she wields passed down as regalias leave little to complain in the terms of combat efficiency due to their mythical status.

Having trained as a shrine priestess, Blazing Lord can pray for and bestow blessings upon her party. Years of travelling in solitude and countless battles also taught her the importance of preparation before moving onwards, she uses her generosity to help her teammates move foward.

Despite the strange, menacing aura surrounding her, the new traveling visitor explains she means no harm and swears her loyalty to you, her only wish is the conquest of these cursed lands. While her words seem sincere, you can clearly sense she's hiding something - she seems to be the type to cause havoc.

作为一个熟练的战斗者，炽灵神使可以削弱敌人，并给她和她的盟友创造优势。当敌人变得虚弱时，她可以释放体内的兽魂，迅速消灭残余敌人，炽灵神使善用她的“奇妙策略”战斗
炽灵神使穿着家传的武士服装，依靠自己的敏捷和术法来避免受创。她的矛与剑作为王权象征代代相传，作为传说中神使，她的武艺更是无与伦比。
身为神社的巫女，炽灵神使可以为她的信徒祈祷，赐予祝福。多年的独自旅行和无数的战斗，也教会了她在上路前做好准备的重要性，她会慷慨地帮助她的队友前行。
尽管身带神秘又不可侵犯的光环，这位新来的旅行者表示她无意伤害你，并发誓对你忠诚，她唯一的愿望就是征服这片被诅咒的土地。虽然她的话听起来很真诚，但你可以清楚地感觉到她在隐藏什么......她似乎是那种会带来混乱的人。

感受我愤怒的的地狱之火吧!
我将赐你最大的仁慈——死亡。
我将使用，这王族的诅咒。
{colour_start|ushiro}解开诅印，挽救众生!{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}呵，该我上了吗?{colour_end}
{colour_start|ushiro}伟大的狐神!请你帮助我，消灭我们的敌人!{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}没问题{colour_end}
{colour_start|ushiro}啊，古老的神灵，赐予他们死亡吧{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}大善{colour_end}
{colour_start|ushiro}助我一臂之力.. 妖刀!{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}噶----!鲜血!{colour_end}
{colour_start|ushiro}好痛苦..{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}我以你们的灵魂为食。{colour_end}

佩服了?这还只是雕虫小技。
{colour_start|fox_god}还是有那么多没杀!{colour_end} {colour_start|ushiro}暂时冷静点。{colour_end}

无需担心，我们突破过更糟的处境。
要当一个懦夫，一具尸体，还是一个胜利者?我会看着你
恢复你的理智，你的任务还没有完成。
这是从我家乡买来的食物，像这样把它包起来…
来,吃这个。够你饱餐一顿。
这就是我家乡的食物。希望它合你的口味。
要避免失败，就要找到内心的平衡。
了解这个世界，才能找到内心的平静。
我们将共同努力，在这条征途中寻求伟大的荣耀!
坚忍，力量和勇气!拥有了这些，敌人就不过是只害虫。
大家不用担心!凭借我们的技艺和智慧，这个地牢必被征服。
我的神明向我微笑，他也将向你微笑。
不用担心，天神会守护我们。
王者的祝福会助你一臂之力。
要取得胜利，你需要耐力和强大的力量!
屡战屡胜，才是你应该追求的目标。
不经历艰辛，就没有胜利。
这是来自我家乡的抚慰与祝福，享受这短暂的时刻吧。
让我们忘掉所有那些恐怖的东西，放松一下，如何?
不-可能, 这..就是我的结局?
即使我倒下，也会再度回来的!那时，你们将被化为飞灰!
{colour_start|ushiro}接受失败就等于…得到平静。{colour_end} {colour_start|fox_god}你的意志将会传承下去……{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}就这样吗?诅咒永远不会结束..{colour_end}
要成为最强之人，就必须打破平衡!
好痛苦，真正的痛苦…然而，这并不能阻止我!
哈哈哈，是时候自己开辟一条道路了!
退却带来失败，胜利之路唯有前进!
撤退没有荣耀，逃兵没有救赎!
{colour_start|fox_god}干嘛着急呢?还有一些害虫需要收拾{colour_end}
哈哈哈，你就只有这点能耐?!
是运气好还是你还没瞎?
你在干什么!敌人在那边!
{colour_start|fox_god}攻击你的敌人，呆子，别打他旁边的空气!{colour_end}
{colour_start|fox_god}这些人真是站在你这边的吗，丫头?{colour_end}
如果在这时接受，将是我的耻辱!
{colour_start|fox_god}她只需要痛饮敌人的鲜血，小子{colour_end}
让开，我不在前线，如何杀敌!
{colour_start|fox_god}别用你那肮脏的下人之手玷污它...{colour_end}
我不需要!我的力量足够了!
安静，我不需要这种东西。
清酒和食物助你茁壮成长!
这地方对我来说有点新鲜，不过，它也被我踩在脚下.
我要把这点记在我的卷轴上..
那时候，长长的走廊让我感觉很安全..
魔鬼们一定是被我吓跑了!
我正在开辟通往胜利的道路!

노련한 전투원인 열령신사는 적들을 약화시켜 전세를 유리하게 이끄는데에 익숙합니다. 최후에는, 적들이 허약해졌을 때를 노려 기묘한 힘을 사용하는 야수를 해방하고 남은 적들을 쓸어버립니다.
열령신사는 방어를 위해서는 대대로 전해지는 전사의 복장만을 착용하며 나머지는 그녀의 손재주와 마법에 의존합니다. 그녀가 휘두르는 창검은 신화적인 위상 덕에 전투 효율 측면에서는 결점이 거의 없습니다.
신성한 무녀로 훈련 받은 열령신사는 일행을 위해 기도해주거나 축복해줄 수 있습니다. 수 년간 홀로 견뎌온 여행과 전투는 그녀에게 준비의 중요성을 가르쳐주었고, 그녀는 동료들이 앞으로 나아갈 수 있도록 정성껏 보살펴줍니다.
기묘하고, 위협적인 분위기를 풍기는 손님이 찾아왔습니다. 그녀는 해를 끼치지 않을 것이며 충성을 맹세하겠다고 약속합니다. 그녀의 유일한 소원은 이 저주받은 영지를 구원하는 것입니다. 일단은 진심 같지만..뭔가 숨기고 있는 것 같습니다.

A skilled combatant, Blazing Lord can debilitate the adversaries and set up the field of battle to give her and her allies' and advantage. Then, when the foes are weakened and frail, she can unleash the beast within and quickly wipe down the remaining enemies, Blazing Lord fights through her own so called "Wondrous Tactics"

Wearing no more than a warrior's outfit passed down by her family, Blazing Lord relies on her dexterity and magic to avoid injury. Sharp blades of her naginata and the cursed sword she wields passed down as regalias leave little to complain in the terms of combat efficiency due to their mythical status.

Having trained as a shrine priestess, Blazing Lord can pray for and bestow blessings upon her party. Years of travelling in solitude and countless battles also taught her the importance of preparation before moving onwards, she uses her generosity to help her teammates move foward.

Despite the strange, menacing aura surrounding her, the new traveling visitor explains she means no harm and swears her loyalty to you, her only wish is the conquest of these cursed lands. While her words seem sincere, you can clearly sense she's hiding something - she seems to be the type to cause havoc.
